name: Specie Finance
description: Global neobank for trade finance. Single account replacing 4+ traditional bank accounts for importers/exporters.
longDescription: Led by Frankie DiGiacomo (ex-Morgan Stanley). Building on Seismic for encrypted payment rails. Provides unified liquidity, built-in controls, and local payments for importers/exporters across 124+ countries. Privacy is essential for the businesses they serve.
integrationNote: Building on Seismic - Privacy for trade finance transactions

name: Cred
description: Private credit service for frontier businesses using proprietary credit analytics.
longDescription: Led by Julian Gay (sold previous company to AppDirect). Backed by Alliance DAO. Building on Seismic to deploy encrypted lending rails. Provides fast working capital to frontier businesses that traditional finance overlooks. Privacy is non-negotiable for the businesses they serve.
integrationNote: Building on Seismic - Encrypted private credit rails

name: PayPal
description: Global online payments system supporting online money transfers.
longDescription: One of the world's largest payment platforms with 430M+ active accounts. Owns Venmo, Braintree, and Xoom.

name: Coinbase
description: Largest US cryptocurrency exchange by trading volume.
longDescription: Public company (NASDAQ: COIN) with 110M+ verified users. Offers trading, custody, staking, and Web3 wallet.

name: Stripe
description: Global payment processing infrastructure powering millions of internet businesses.
longDescription: Founded by Patrick and John Collison. Processes hundreds of billions annually. Used by Amazon, Google, Shopify, and millions of startups.
integrationNote: High potential - B2B payments need privacy

name: Adyen
description: Enterprise payment platform for global unified commerce.
longDescription: Dutch fintech processing €767B annually. Powers payments for Netflix, Uber, Spotify, Microsoft, and major enterprises.

name: Circle
description: Issuer of USDC stablecoin with $30B+ in circulation.
longDescription: Major stablecoin issuer and Web3 infrastructure company. USDC is second-largest stablecoin by market cap.

name: Nubank
description: Latin America's largest digital bank serving 85M+ customers.
longDescription: Brazilian fintech disrupting traditional banking in LATAM. Offers credit cards, accounts, loans, and investments.
integrationNote: Massive privacy potential in LATAM market

name: PhonePe
description: India's top UPI payment app owned by Walmart.
longDescription: 500M+ registered users processing 50% of India's UPI transactions. Acquired by Walmart via Flipkart.

name: Checkout.com
description: Cloud-based payment processing for enterprise merchants.
longDescription: UK fintech valued at $40B. Processes payments for Netflix, Klarna, Coinbase, and major global brands.

name: Airwallex
description: Global payments platform for modern businesses with multi-currency accounts.
longDescription: Australian fintech processing $235B+ annually. Provides cards, FX, and embedded finance for 200K+ businesses.
integrationNote: Strong fit for encrypted business payments

name: Revolut
description: Digital banking with trading, crypto, and international spending.
longDescription: UK neobank with 35M+ customers. Offers banking, stock trading, crypto, and international transfers in one app.
integrationNote: Strong candidate for private transaction layer

name: Kraken
description: US cryptocurrency exchange known for security and margin trading.
longDescription: Founded by Jesse Powell. One of the oldest exchanges, known for proof-of-reserves and security focus.

name: eToro
description: Social trading platform with copy trading features.
longDescription: 30M+ users worldwide. Known for CopyTrader feature to automatically replicate successful traders.

name: Marqeta
description: Modern card issuing platform for fintechs.
longDescription: Powers cards for Square, DoorDash, Affirm, and more. Processes $200B+ annually.

name: Square
description: Financial services and digital payments company for small businesses.
longDescription: Founded by Jack Dorsey. Provides POS systems, Cash App, and business banking. Renamed to Block Inc.

name: Razorpay
description: India's leading payment gateway with full-stack financial solutions.
longDescription: Founded by Harshil Mathur and Shashank Kumar. Processes over $180B annually for 8M+ businesses in India.
integrationNote: Ideal for private merchant settlements in India

name: Mercado Pago
description: Latin America's largest fintech by MercadoLibre.
longDescription: 60M+ active users across LATAM. Offers payments, lending, insurance, and crypto services.

name: Paytm
description: India's leading digital payments and financial services company.
longDescription: Over 350M registered users. Offers payments, banking, lending, insurance, and wealth management.

name: Chime
description: Fee-free mobile banking with early paycheck access.
longDescription: US neobank with 21M+ customers. No monthly fees, overdraft fees, or minimum balances. Automatic savings features.

name: SoFi
description: Digital financial services including loans, banking, and investing.
longDescription: US fintech offering student loan refinancing, mortgages, personal loans, credit cards, investing, and banking.

name: Robinhood
description: Commission-free trading app that democratized investing.
longDescription: Pioneered zero-commission trading. 23M+ funded accounts with stocks, options, and crypto trading.

name: Wise
description: International money transfers at real exchange rates without hidden fees.
longDescription: Founded by Kristo Käärmann and Taavet Hinrikus. Moves £9B monthly across borders for 16M+ customers.

name: N26
description: European mobile bank with instant notifications and spending insights.
longDescription: German neobank operating across Europe with 8M+ customers. Full banking license with deposit protection.

name: GCash
description: Philippines' leading mobile wallet with 80M+ users.
longDescription: Owned by Globe Telecom and Ant Group. Dominant in Philippines mobile payments and financial services.

name: Klarna
description: Buy now, pay later leader serving 150M consumers globally.
longDescription: Swedish fintech offering flexible payment options at checkout. Partners with 500K+ retailers worldwide.

name: Monzo
description: UK digital bank with instant spending notifications and budgeting.
longDescription: British challenger bank with 8M+ customers. Known for coral debit card and user-friendly app.

name: GoPay
description: Indonesia's leading e-wallet by GoTo Group.
longDescription: Part of GoTo ecosystem (Gojek + Tokopedia). 40M+ monthly transacting users.

name: Wealthfront
description: Automated investing and financial planning platform.
longDescription: Pioneer in robo-advising with $50B+ AUM. Offers investment accounts, high-yield cash, and planning tools.

name: Brex
description: Corporate cards and spend management for startups and enterprises.
longDescription: Brazilian founders built corporate cards requiring no personal guarantee. Now offers full spend management.

name: Affirm
description: Transparent buy now, pay later with no hidden fees.
longDescription: Founded by PayPal co-founder Max Levchin. Partners with Amazon, Shopify, and major retailers for point-of-sale financing.

name: Betterment
description: Largest independent robo-advisor in the US.
longDescription: Manages $40B+ with automated investing, tax-loss harvesting, and retirement planning.

name: Current
description: Mobile banking for modern life with faster direct deposits.
longDescription: US mobile bank targeting underbanked consumers with no hidden fees and instant spending notifications.

name: Blockchain.com
description: Crypto wallet and exchange with 85M+ wallet users.
longDescription: One of the oldest Bitcoin companies. Provides wallet, exchange, and explorer services.

name: Gemini
description: Regulated crypto exchange founded by Winklevoss twins.
longDescription: New York-based exchange with strong compliance focus. Offers trading, custody, and credit card.

name: Ramp
description: Corporate cards with built-in expense management and savings.
longDescription: Fastest-growing fintech in US history. Helps companies save 5% on average through spend insights.

name: Afterpay
description: Buy now, pay later service acquired by Block (Square).
longDescription: Australian BNPL pioneer now part of Block Inc. 20M+ active customers shopping at 100K+ merchants.

name: Acorns
description: Micro-investing app that rounds up purchases to invest spare change.
longDescription: 10M+ users investing spare change automatically. Also offers checking, retirement, and kids accounts.

name: LendingClub
description: America's largest online lending marketplace.
longDescription: Pioneered peer-to-peer lending, now a full-spectrum fintech bank. $80B+ in loans originated.

name: Upgrade
description: Credit products including cards and personal loans.
longDescription: Founded by Renaud Laplanche (LendingClub founder). Offers credit cards with fixed payments and personal loans.

name: Public
description: Social investing platform for stocks, ETFs, and crypto.
longDescription: Combines investing with social features. Users can share portfolios and follow other investors.

name: Root Insurance
description: Usage-based car insurance using smartphone telematics.
longDescription: Prices insurance based on actual driving behavior captured through mobile app.

name: Lemonade
description: AI-powered insurance for renters, homeowners, car, pet, and life.
longDescription: Uses AI for instant claims and policies. B Corp with Giveback program donating unclaimed premiums.

name: MX
description: Financial data platform for banks and fintechs.
longDescription: Provides data enhancement, analytics, and connectivity for 2000+ banks and fintechs.

name: Plaid
description: Financial data network connecting 8000+ apps to bank accounts.
longDescription: Powers connections for Venmo, Robinhood, Coinbase, and thousands more. 100M+ linked accounts.
